title: The Devil's Playground
description:
Notes: Xvid video, Lame mp3 audio.

Director: Fred Schepsi
Film Created: 1976
Plot Synopsis : (by Paul Brenner) Fred Schepsi wrote and directed this tense melodrama which takes place at a Roman Catholic boarding school. The film deals with the charged emotional tensions of a group of pubescent boys, who find their sexual urges stifled by the school&#039;s oppressive atmosphere. Depicting the chaste lifestyle of the religious functionaries, the burgeoning sexual desires of the young men are bottled up until they are ready to explode.
Special: Stars the Jesuit-Zionist himself, Thomas Kineally (Author of &#039;Schindler&#039;s List&#039;).
